verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H4397>him,<s%> all his angels! <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H6635>him,<s%> all his army!
<S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H8064>him,<s%> you heavens of <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> You <S%H4325>waters<s%> that are above the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
Let them <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> For he <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> and they were <S%H1254>created.<s%>
He has also <S%H5975>established<s%> them <S%H5703>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%> He has <S%H5414>made<s%> a <S%H2706>decree<s%> which will not pass <S%H5674>away.<s%>
<S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> you great sea <S%H8577>creatures,<s%> and all <S%H8415>depths!<s%>
<S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> and all <S%H3816>peoples;<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%> and all <S%H8199>judges<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%>

let them <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for his <S%H8034>name<s%> alone is <S%H7682>exalted.<s%> His <S%H1935>glory<s%> is above the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>

He has <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of his <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H8416>praise<s%> of all his <S%H2623>saints;<s%> even of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H1984>him.<s%> Praise <S%H3050>Yah!<s%>
